Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are going to break down the description step by step and build the process tree accordingly. Steps 1. The process starts with a sequence of A RG IA TI TC

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After TC, there is an exclusive choice between CE and FBP. This is an XOR node with two children CE and FBP

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: the loop body lets call it L is SC then exclusive treatment TM or SPT then exclusive RDT FCE or FBA

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: So that doesnt match. Alternatively we can think of the loop as * ( -> ( T0 L ) , tau ) but we dont want to do T0 again in the loop

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After the initial test T0, we have X ( tau, * (L, tau) ) if T0 normal skip loop tau if abnormal enter loop

Name: Validation - PE
Text: * (L, tau) = -> ( L, X ( tau, -> ( tau, L ) ) ) This means do L then choice either exit tau or do tau and then L again

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Step 5 parallel + AI NC Step 6 sequence FAS DDI Step 7 parallel + BL ICP MRF

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Root sequence with children A RG IA TI TC xor1 initial test xor2 condition loop parallel1 seq2 parallel2

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: use tau leaf with label None for silent steps in XOR and LOOP
